item.title: 【Helpdesk】help me decrypt a video and audio file
item.description:
i downloaded encrypted video and audio file from ON AIR with n_m3u8dl-cli
and i dont know how to decrypt them and merge into one.

heres what i got:
Code:
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<MPD xmlns:cenc="urn:mpeg:cenc:2013" xmlns:mspr="urn:microsoft:playready" xmlns="urn:mpeg:dash:schema:mpd:2011" profiles="urn:mpeg:dash:profile:isoff-live:2011" minBufferTime="PT1.92S" mediaPresentationDuration="PT1H48M2.480S" type="static">

    <AdaptationSet mimeType="video/mp4" segmentAlignment="true" startWithSAP="1" maxWidth="1920" maxHeight="1080" maxFrameRate="25">

Code:
import requests

headers = {
    'accept': '*/*',
    'accept-language': 'en-GB,en-US;q=0.9,en;q=0.8,ja;q=0.7',
    'origin': 'https://onair.events',
    'referer': 'https://onair.events/',
    'sec-ch-ua': '"Google Chrome";v="123", "Not:A-Brand";v="8", "Chromium";v="123"',
    'sec-ch-ua-mobile': '?0',
    'sec-ch-ua-platform': '"Windows"',
    'sec-fetch-dest': 'empty',
    'sec-fetch-mode': 'cors',
    'sec-fetch-site': 'cross-site',
    'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Safari/537.36',
}

response = requests.get(
    'https://api.onair-media.stream/multi-cdn?url=https://po.cdn.onair.events/vod/989ac240-e440-11ee-a339-9f6bcf850a0f/ufz2ye5e/dfasn4vc/index.mpd',
    headers=headers,
)

item.author: murayan_k

item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines (2003) BluRay 720p x264 DTS - WiKi
item.description:
A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

Download:

Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
item.author: sunnyillion

item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991) BluRay 720p x264 DTS - WiKi
item.description:
A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

Download:

Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
item.author: sunnyillion

item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - The Terminator (1984) BluRay 720p x264 DTS - WiKi
item.description:
A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

Download:

Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
item.author: sunnyillion
